name: Chubby Ninja [GB]
description:
My submission to the GBJAM5. Its inspired by old Zelda games like Links Awakening.

Help the Chubby Ninja figure out where he is and try to escape!

Controls:

Attack: Z
Bomb: X
Move: Arrow Keys

Beta Testers:
Wutz, Txron, Nutz, Hunter99

When the message box appears at the start you have to Press enter. Also the end screen was supposed to say "Thanks for playing" but the text color is the same as the background color. That's what you get for making last minute changes without testing them properly I guess...
